item.title: 关注美联储评论和经济数据，期货价格上扬
item.description: 美国股指期货周三上涨，其中与 S&P 500 指数挂钩的股指期货创下历史新高，因为投资者关注即将公布的数据以及包括美国央行主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔在内的央行官员的评论。【原文：U.S. stock index futures rose on Wednesday, with those tied to the S&P 500 hitting all-time highs as investors focus on upcoming data and commentary from central bank officials including Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 大众汽车首席执行官与工人发生冲突，因倒闭和薪酬问题矛盾加深
item.description: 大众汽车公司首席执行官和劳工老板在周三的员工会议上发生冲突，管理层力主大幅裁员，而工人们则警告说，只要工厂关闭仍是这家陷入困境的德国汽车制造商工资谈判的一部分，他们就会举行更多罢工。【原文：Volkswagen's CEO and labour boss clashed during a staff meeting on Wednesday, with management pushing for major cuts while workers warned of more strikes as long as plant closures remain part of wage negotiations at the embattled German automaker.】

item.title: 美国参议员抨击航空公司视乘客为 "行走的储蓄罐
item.description: 美国参议院一个小组的负责人严厉批评了航空公司不断上涨的行李费和座位分配费，称航空公司正在寻找从乘客身上榨取更多钱财的新方法。【原文：The head of a U.S. Senate panel harshly criticized rising airline fees for luggage and seat assignments, saying carriers are looking for new ways to extract more money from passengers.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，就业成本上升影响服务业增长
item.description: 周三的一项调查显示，由于雇主税即将增加，影响了企业的招聘计划，英国占主导地位的服务业在11月份失去了活力，尽管其幅度没有人们最初担心的那么大。【原文：Britain's dominant services sector lost steam in November, although not by as much as first feared, as a looming rise in employer taxes weighed on firms' hiring plans, a survey showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 采购经理人指数显示欧元区 11 月商业活动大幅下滑
item.description: 一项调查显示，整个欧元区的商业活动在上个月急剧下降，因为该集团占主导地位的服务业与制造业一起出现萎缩。【原文：Business activity across the euro zone fell sharply last month as the bloc's dominant services sector joined the manufacturing sector in contracting, according to a survey which showed a broadbased decline.】

item.title: 调查显示德国企业对中国市场的信心降至历史最低点
item.description: 一个德国商业游说团体周三表示，在华德国企业的商业情绪正处于历史最低点，因为它们面临着日益激烈的中国竞争和不断放缓的经济。【原文：Business sentiment among German companies in China is at an all-time low, a German business lobby group said on Wednesday, as they face rising Chinese competition and a slowing economy.】

item.title: 经合组织警告全球增长前景面临保护主义风险
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织（Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development）周三表示，如果卷土重来的保护主义不会破坏全球贸易的复苏，那么世界经济将在未来两年稳步增长。【原文：The world economy is set for steady growth in the next two years if resurgent protectionism does not derail a recovery in global trade, the Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿联酋阿布扎比制定措施帮助企业摆脱石油束缚
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国（UAE）首都阿布扎比（Abu Dhabi）周三制定了简化企业流程的措施，以努力实现经济多元化，摆脱石油依赖。【原文：Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates (UAE), set out measures on Wednesday to simplify processes for businesses as it strives to diversify its economy away from oil.】

item.title: 投资委员会表示，泰国将延长电池电动车的生产时限
item.description: 泰国投资委员会周三表示，泰国将延长电池电动汽车（BEV）的生产时限，并为混合动力电动汽车提供激励措施。【原文：Thailand will extend a production timeframe for battery electric vehicles (BEV) and offer incentives for hybrid EVs, its Board of Investment said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Stellantis 否认关于苹果公司任命 Maestri 为新首席执行官的报道
item.description: 法国-意大利汽车制造商 Stellantis 周三否认了 Corriere della Sera日报关于该公司计划任命即将离任的苹果公司财务主管卢卡-梅斯特里（Luca Maestri）为新任首席执行官的报道。【原文：French-Italian car maker Stellantis on Wednesday denied a report in Corriere della Sera daily that it planned to name outgoing Apple finance chief Luca Maestri as its new chief executive.】

item.title: 沃尔沃汽车公司报告 11 月份销量增长 5
item.description: 沃尔沃汽车公司（Volvo Cars）周三表示，在欧洲和美国的带动下，该公司 11 月份的汽车销量同比增长 5%，达到 66,977 辆。【原文：Volvo Cars' sales rose 5% year on year in November to 66,977 vehicles, led by Europe and the United States, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 诺维信将以 2 亿美元的价格向诺和诺德出售捷克生产部门
item.description: COVID-19 疫苗生产商诺瓦克斯（Novavax）周三表示，将以 2 亿美元的价格向 Wegovy 生产商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）出售其在捷克共和国的生产设施，并将所得资金用于疫苗生产线。【原文：COVID-19 vaccine maker Novavax said on Wednesday it will sell its manufacturing facility in Czech Republic to Wegovy-maker Novo Nordisk for $200 million and use the proceeds for its vaccine pipeline.】

item.title: 尹炳世总统戒严令申请失败引发动荡，韩国股市下滑
item.description: 韩国金融市场综述：【原文：Round-up of South Korean financial markets:】

item.title: Stellantis 董事长将选择苹果 CFO Maestri 担任汽车制造商的新 CEO - 报纸
item.description: 据《晚邮报》（Corriere della Sera）报道，在卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）于周日宣布辞职后，Stellantis 董事长约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）计划任命即将离任的苹果公司首席财务官卢卡-梅斯特里（Luca Maestri）为这家意大利-法国汽车制造商的新任首席执行官。【原文：Stellantis' Chairman John Elkann plans to name Luca Maestri, the outgoing CFO of Apple, as the new CEO of the Italian-French carmaker after Sunday's shock resignation of Carlos Tavares, newspaper Corriere della Sera reported.】

item.title: 人民日报》称中国可接受低于 5%的 GDP 增长率
item.description: 国营报纸《人民日报》周三称，中国并不执着于实现特定的 GDP 增长率，经济增长速度低于 5%也是可以接受的，因为没有必要 "崇拜速度"。【原文：China is not wedded to achieving specific GDP growth rates, and a pace of less than 5% for the economy is acceptable as there is no need for the "worship of speed", state newspaper People's Daily said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 政治证明投资者对 "韩国折扣 "的判断是正确的
item.description: 全球投资者对韩国的估值一直低于其他市场，原因包括与朝鲜的紧张关系以及韩国企业集团的结构紧凑等。【原文：Global investors have always valued South Korea below other markets for reasons ranging from tensions with the North to the tight structures of its conglomerates - politics this week gave them cause to deepen that discount.】

item.title: 澳大利亚力拓预计 2025 年铜产量将激增
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业巨头力拓（Rio Tinto）周三预测，其 2025 财年的铜矿综合产量将有所增长，主要原因是其位于蒙古的奥尤陶勒盖（Oyu Tolgoi）矿场明年的产量预计将激增 50%。【原文：Australian mining giant Rio Tinto on Wednesday forecast a boost in its consolidated mined copper production for fiscal 2025, driven primarily by an anticipated 50% surge in output from its Oyu Tolgoi operation in Mongolia next year.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，前首席财务官彼得将领导宝马监事会
item.description: 据德国《商报》周三援引公司消息人士的话报道，宝马前财务总监尼古拉斯-彼得（Nicolas Peter）已被选中接替诺伯特-雷瑟夫（Norbert Reithofer），领导这家德国汽车集团的监事会。【原文：BMW's former finance chief Nicolas Peter has been tapped to lead the German auto group's supervisory board, succeeding Norbert Reithofer, the Handelsblatt newspaper reported on Wednesday, citing company sources.】

item.title: 俄罗斯服务业采购经理人指数显示服务业连续第五个月扩张
item.description: 周三的一项商业调查显示，在新订单增加的推动下，俄罗斯服务业的活动在 11 月份连续第五个月出现扩张，且扩张速度为 1 月份以来最快。【原文：Activity across Russia's services sector expanded for a fifth month running in November and at its fastest pace since January, a business survey showed on Wednesday, driven by a rise in new orders.】

item.title: 中国禁止向美国出口关键矿产品后，澳大利亚林纳斯公司（Lynas）股价接近三周高点
item.description: 澳大利亚林纳斯稀土公司（Lynas Rare Earths）的股价周三攀升至近三周高点，此前一天，中国禁止向美国出口某些重要矿产。【原文：Shares of Australia's Lynas Rare Earths climbed to a near three-week high on Wednesday, a day after China banned exports of some critical mineral to the United States.】

item.title: 独家报道：大型对冲基金向医生和科学家求助，以求在制药业占据优势
item.description: 八位消息人士告诉路透社，在医药股股价大幅波动之后，全球最大的一些对冲基金正在聘请医生、科学家和分析师，让他们对医药股的前景有专业的见解。【原文：Some of the world's largest hedge funds are hiring doctors, scientists and analysts to give them expert insight into the prospects for pharmaceutical stocks after big share swings in the sector, eight sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 谷歌云与法航荷航合作开发人工智能技术
item.description: 谷歌云计算公司（Google Cloud）周三表示，它已与法航荷航（Air France-KLM）合作，在该航空集团的数据中部署生成式人工智能（AI）技术。【原文：Google Cloud said on Wednesday it had partnered with Air France-KLM to deploy generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology on the airline group's data.】

item.title: 早间竞标政治风暴消磨情绪
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 投资者对韩国政治危机的反应
item.description: 韩国数十年来最大的政治危机爆发，立法者要求弹劾总统尹锡烈，而他在宣布戒严令数小时后又推翻了这一决定，韩国股市周三下跌。【原文：South Korean shares fell on Wednesday amid the country's biggest political crisis in decades as lawmakers called for the impeachment of President Yoon Suk Yeol after he declared martial law only to reverse the move hours later.】

item.title: 债券守夜人暂时放过法国，但政治危机将带来更多痛苦
item.description: 法国总理米歇尔-巴尼耶（Michel Barnier）警告说，债券投资者可能不会让法国遭受可怕的金融 "风暴"，但政治危机的余波将伤害企业、消费者和纳税人。【原文：Bond investors are likely to spare France the dire financial "storm" Prime Minister Michel Barnier has warned of, but the fallout from the political crisis will hurt businesses, consumers and taxpayers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚敦促用户在谷歌和 genAI 占据主导地位的情况下提供更多互联网选择
item.description: 澳大利亚竞争监督机构称，有必要重新审视确保为互联网用户提供更多选择的努力，理由是谷歌在搜索引擎市场占据主导地位，其竞争对手未能利用人工智能的蓬勃发展。【原文：Australia's competition watchdog said there was a need to revisit efforts to ensure greater choice for internet users, citing Google's dominant search engine market share and its competitors' failure to capitalise on the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 报刊称，智利计划到 2033 年在采矿业投资 830 亿美元
item.description: 智利国营机构 Cochilco 周二在一份报纸报道中援引一份研究报告称，智利计划从今年到 2033 年投资约 831.8 亿美元，比去年的估计增加 27%。【原文：Chile plans to invest about $83.18 billion from this year through 2033, state-run agency Cochilco said in a study cited in a newspaper report on Tuesday, an increase of 27% from last year's estimate.】

item.title: 随着人工智能的发展，亚洲数据中心交易将不再受估值限制
item.description: 全球投资者正在排队投资亚太地区的数据中心运营商，他们或直接购买股份，或通过公开募股，丝毫不受人工智能服务需求所带来的高估值的影响。【原文：Global investors are queueing up to invest in data centre operators in Asia Pacific either by buying stakes directly or via public offerings, unfazed by their rich valuations that are driven by demand for artificial intelligence-based services.】

item.title: 独家报道：保乐力加否认违反印度法律。它的律师却不这么认为
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份文件，保乐力加公司下令进行的一项内部调查得出结论，该公司印度业务的高层管理人员与新德里的酒类零售商串通一气，违反了法律，尽管这家法国巨头的代表在法庭上和公开场合都否认有不法行为。【原文：An internal investigation ordered by Pernod Ricard concluded that top executives at its India business violated the law by colluding with alcohol retailers in New Delhi, according to a document seen by Reuters, even as the French giant's representatives denied wrongdoing in court and publicly.】

item.title: 中国 SenseTime 重组，专注于人工智能生成式增长
item.description: 亏损的中国人工智能公司SenseTime集团周二表示，该公司已完成重大组织结构调整，旨在加快向人工智能生成技术转型。【原文：Loss-making Chinese AI company SenseTime Group said on Tuesday it has completed a major organizational restructuring aimed at ramping up its shift toward generative AI technologies.】
